name: New Eden (Legofireman)
description:
Team P.A.W presents New Eden a 2d plat-former with elements of horror. The protagonist is a young girl with special gifts that tries to escape the facility.To escape the facility the player will have to avoid guards while collecting keys.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team P.A.W

Andrew Billiard, Brandon Foster(me), Noah Souser, Brittany Talkington, and Emily Hilt
